Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: Me neither but I’ve been following this project for a long time, at first it was because I was interested in seeing how a supply chain would work on the Blockchain, but the more and more I read about Vanig the more I saw how it stands out against other projects in the same field.  They have put a lot of emphasis on explaining how each part of their project will work in the future and they post detailed articles about the events they have attended and the meetings they have been to. This helps them stand out because they are very open and transparent and they have been throughout the ICO process.  I also enjoyed an article from Vanig where they summarised how the crypto market has performed over the last year, it helps new investors that may not be that clued up on Blockchain/crypto and it also fills you with confidence in the team because they have shared  their own knowledge and expertise in the markets: https://medium.com/vanigplatform/the-state-of-cryptocurrency-market-in-2018-7ea693d85794

Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: I am not sure how will they tackle to volatility of the token since usually supplier need a stable currency to be able to trade. For example the supplier is selling a dress for 100 Vanig tokens that say equates to $100. The cost of the dress (cloth, sewing..etc) is say $80. the supplier sells and 10 days later someone pays the 100 Vanig tokens and now the 100 Vanig tokens equate to $70 due to some drop or bear effect on the market. The supplier is at loss now.

Author: cryptossi
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: That's why I think they should introduce another token, and run a two token approach.  Token 1 can be used for purchases on the platform, and it will be pegged to a value in local fiat currency.  Token 2 will be the ones that are currently being sold in the ICO, their purpose will be a store of wealth that can be traded and used on exchanges.  Investors could convert Token 2 to Token 1 to use on the platform at a reduced discount compared to buying in with fiat.  I know it complicates matters, but it's true what Ibininja said, the markets fluctuating could put a traditional business in debt if the markets were bearish for a long period of time.

Author: jonhsongotti
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: Vanig : Integrated E-commerce and Supply Chain Ecosystem.Vanig is the world’s first integrated E-Commerce platform and Supply Chain ecosystem powered by the blockchain. Vanig Patent Pending solution addresses several significant Supply Chain and E-Commerce challenges and inefficiencies, providing a higher level of brand experience.The Vanig platform is safe, secure, and user-friendly, benefiting all members of the ecosystem and embraces cryptocurrency payments. It shortens recall process and timelines for manufacturers and retailers, providing real-time product visibility through to the consumer. Provenance information on products, increasingly an essential consumer ask, is fully integrated. Join this potential project. Do not miss this opportunity.

Author: cryptossi
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: There are problems in the US with crypto regulation and I understand the hesitancy of teams that do not want to set up shop there initially. However, thousands of crypto/Blockchain projects still set up in the US every year. A lot of them do extremely well and it can be very beneficial due to US being a massive market for retail, health, education and pretty much everything. Over half of Vanig’s senior team are based in America and I just find it a bit weird that they want to wait until 2024 to open up in the US & Europe.  Don’t get me wrong I really like Vanig but I just think someone else will have done what they want to achieve in the US before they even get there. Supply chains are not a new idea and they have a lot of competition, they need to think of the first mover advantage that they could have by implementing Blockchain to traditional practices. Companies like Amazon and Walmart will slowly start updating their tech and moving operations to the Blockchain, Vanig need to be in there as well as an alternative in a trillion dollar retail market.

Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: Vanig is an integrated Commerce platform and Supply Chain Ecosystem that is powered by the blockchain. It is a known fact that Supply Chain has not evolved fast enough in today’s E Commerce age. Vanig aims to solve that by addressing some of the significant issues plaguing Supply Chain for the manufacturers and sellers, and also equally important is Vanig commerce platform that will be a truly rewarding shopping experience for customers, as they will get good product selection, real reviews, save money, get rewarded, have access to product provenance information and track and trace, making shopping trustworthy again.

Author: cryptossi
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: I think they are good countries to set up in, however the team should really start working on setting up a site and supply chain in the US as soon as possible. In terms of market size the US offers the biggest opportunity for retailers, for example Walmart's revenue in the 2016 fiscal year was $482.1 billion, in comparison with the ten largest companies in The Phillipines, (this includes banks, conglomerates, energy suppliers and department stores), recorded a combined revenue of $187.6 billion in 2016.  I know it's unfair to make a comparison between The Phillipines & the US because of the size of the countries and the power each country has. But it highlights the difference in retail markets. Walmart, which is just one company in America has over 2.5x the combined revenue of the ten biggest companies in The Phillipines. It does make you think they need to put some focus on the US retail market and if I was Vanig I would start preparing the US strategy and branding now.

Author: firestormaow
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: It was great to receive news from Vanig for launching World’s First Integrated E-Commerce and Supply Chain Ecosystem Powered by Blockchain. This can be considered a great result because of Vanig's efforts in the past.  Some Key features of Vanig: - Vanig solves several significant Supply Chain and E-Commerce challenges and inefficiencies, providing a higher level of brand experience - Vanig’s Supply Chain ecosystem leverages the latest in blockchain technology using HyperLedger’s Sawtooth technology - Vanig uses Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to make advertising effective, to certify sellers and provide a customized shopping experience for the buyers With the first success mentioned above, I believe that Vanig is truly a potential project which will develop strongly in the near future

Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: Good article, the points it mentions are interesting.  I think visibility is going to be even more important in the future, look at Amazon, you can even see how many stops away from your house they currently are.   if they do it right, you could see where your order is, and if your at work, go home and meet the delivery driver before they arrive.   The reviews section is interesting as well, especially with the scandle around buying fake Amazon reviews a few years ago.  With the blockchain, you could literally track the moment of purchase to verify that the review came from a legit source who purchased and used the product.  Can't wait to see this fully implanted.

Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: I was taking a scroll on Vanig website and came across  some of the problems Vanig plans to solve;  Supply Chain and E-commerce space.  Lack of transparency and full visibility in the Supply Chain  Too many intermediaries and manual paper work  Static or non-existent inventory management  Inefficient tracking of products  High selling fees on E-commerce platforms for sellers  Lack of provenance information for products for buyers  By providing a solution to this problems Vanig takes the E-commerce industry to a new height.

Author: jamzzz123
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: Vanig is a e-commerce platform which aims to use blockchain to address the key issues of the industry.  Features:    Blockchain-powered ecosystem allows every stakeholder in the supply chain to gain access to direct peer-to-peer communication. All data is distributed symmetrically, which allows for a shorter recall process. Smart contracts ensure the security of transactions between supply chain participants. Vanig offers access to external feeds from sensors, data oracles and other trackers via their APIs, which allows for real time tracking The platform stores accessible information on defective and fraudulent products Vanig operates one-click product listings from various e-commerce stores, enabling a CSV file bulk upload, API connection and automatic retrievel/upload of products.

Author: wonly
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: There are some other e-commerce platforms powered by blockchain, but the advantage of Vanig is that we are building a platform with integrated Blockchain E-Commerce and Supply Chain Ecosystem.  So you get benefits like:  Real time Tracking & Complete Transparency for each transaction. Access to provenance information to eliminate fakes and confirm origin of manufacturing. Competitive Pricing due to elimination of middlemen and increase in efficiency.  Please visit our website to learn more: https://vanig.io or join the community of 20K+ members on https://t.me/vanigplatform

Author: wonly
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain

Quote from: nxnqauff on April 20, 2018, 08:07:41 AM Quote from: Pivooooo on April 10, 2018, 10:51:26 AM An e-commerce platform built entirely around the blockchain. Our platform uses Hyperledger Sawtooth to build an e-commerce ecosystem that tackles key issues in e-commerce today. You already have competitors who solve this problem! What will be your feature?  Competitors will always be there. The question is how efficiently others act. I just looked in to this project Vanig. Author: yuvadeep
Title: 🚀🛒[ANN] Vanig.io The Future of Shopping - Integrated E-Commerce & Supply Chain
Body: Vanig is combined with both E-commerce platform and supply chain ecosystem which is used on the blockchain. Vanig help to solve all the problems that are among the existing supply chain and E-commerce platform. Vanig is used to find the products and this is one of the best ways to order the products on the Vagin platform. The product which can buy and sell on the Vanig platform is used to describe incomplete specifications such as name, price, volume, category etc. Thus on this platform, they are going to create a catalog to the easy access for the users helps in selecting the products easily and increases their search speed towards the products. On Vanig platform users can check all the products are listed on the page where users can easily pick the type of product to buy, selects the address to deliver the products and payments can be done in Ethereum, Bitcoin, fiat, and Vanig tokens. The vanig platform has the list of the products and also the information about the revies of the customers that are registered on the blockchain and allows a more trusted trading environment for the users.
